title: Top 2019 fall nail trends, according to Pinterest
text:
Fall is in the air and it's the perfect time to switch up your nails for something fresh, new and trendy.

One great go-to platform that many of us know and love for finding inspiration is non-other than Pinterest.

With that, the company has released five of the most popular fall 2019 nail trends just in time before your next mani appointment.

From Tortoise shells to cow-prints, spice things up with these Pinterst-approved nail trends just ahead. Plus, you can try these looks out on your skin tone using the platform's skintone filters function.

Cow-print

Cow-print nails continue to grow in popularity thanks to A-listers such as Ariana Grande and Kendall Jenner. Try it on all 10 digits or simply try an accent nail.

VSCO nails Ombré

VSCO -- also known as Ombré nails depending on your color palette -- is Instagram gold. This trend has also repeatedly been spotted on Los Angles-based editorial nail artist Betina Goldstein and involves either painting each nail color a different color or trying a gradient of hues.

Look how Goldstein wore a green-toned version of the look accented with Doublemoss Jewelry rings.

Tortoise shell

"Like your favorite sunglasses, but on your nails," Pinterest wrote in a statement describing the Tortoise shell nails trend. These animal print nails are fun, festive and fabulous.

Milky-white acrylic

This cloudy cream-toned trend can be played up with glitter or paired down for an everyday neutral look.

Black marble

Get spooky and chic with this mesmerizing take on marble.
description: Pinterest reveals the top 2019 fall nail trends.
